definition: pirate ship/fig. venture of dubious merit/criminal gang/reactionary faction
thief/traitor/wily/deceitful/evil/extremely
boat/vessel/ship/CL:條|条[tiao2],艘[sou1],隻|只[zhi1]
variant of 船[chuan2]
lit. to board a pirate ship (idiom)/fig. to associate with criminals
lit. to mistakenly board a pirate ship/to embark on a hopeless adventure

sentences.english: You've been on the Love Boat or know someone who has.
sentences.chinese: 你要么已经上了贼船，要么正在觊觎。
